pages.text: The only way to disenchant items is via the $(l:useables/grindstone)$(item)Grindstone$() or by repairing the items via the crafting grid. $(br2)Using the $(l:useables/grindstone)$(item)Grindstone$() removes all enchantments (except curses) and gives experience back based on the level of the enchantment(s) and their value.
